tablab 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    as_labelled()

    Convert a factor to a haven::labelled variable

    cmp_all()

    Compare counts and labels of a list of dataframes

    cmp_cts()

    Compare counts of a list of dataframes

    cmp_types()

    Compare the types of variables in a list of dataframes

    cmp_vallabs()

    Compare the value labels between a list of dataframes

    cmp_varlabs()

    Compare the variable labels between a list of dataframes

    cmp_vars()

    Compare the existence of variables in a list of dataframes

    longen()

    Create long format of a dataframe, keeping the id column.

    make_type_list()

    Coalesce the nv and cv columns to a new list column conserving the type

    mult_assign()

    Successively assign values to variables in a dataframe at specified ids

    set_labs()

    Add a variable label and/or value labels (or none) to a variable.

    strip_attributes()

    Remove attributes from a vector

    tab_all()

    Tabulate a dataframe's variables' value counts, and labels

    tab_attrs()

    Tabulate a dataframe's variables' attributes

    tab_cts()

    Tabulate a dataframe's variables' value counts

    tab_labs()

    Create a variable & value label dataframe

    tab_types()

    Tabulate the variables' types in a dataframe

    tab_vallabs()

    Create a value label dataframe

    tab_varlabs()

    Create a variable label dataframe

    unattr()

    Remove attributes from all variables of a dataframe

    var_to_val_at_ids()

    #' Produce a summary of a dataframe in long format #' #' @param df Dataframe #' @param id ID column in df #' #' @return Returns a dataframe with 5 columns: Variable var, val, #' n, ids & class. #' ids & showing all the values #' val (type indicated in class) each variable var of #' df takes. #' The list column ids (contains all the #' corresponding valus of id) and has n entries. #' @importFrom dplyr case_when #' @importFrom purrr transpose #' @export #' #' @examples #' df <- #' tibble::tibble( #' fbnr = 1:10, #' sex = haven::labelled(c(2, 1, 2, 1, 1, 2, 2, 1, 2, 1), #' label = "sex", #' labels = c(MALES = 1, FEMALES = 2)), #' age = c(24, 23, 23, 41, 23, 39, 30, 18, 31, 48), #' marital = haven::labelled( #' c(1, 7, 2, 6, 4, 5, 3, 8, 4, 2), #' label = "marital status", #' labels = c( #' "single" = 1, #' "steady relationship" = 2, #' "living with partner" = 3, #' "married first time" = 4, #' "remarried" = 5, #' "separated" = 6, #' "divorced" = 7, #' "non-occuring label" = 9 #' ) #' ) #' ) #' longen_id_sum(df, "fbnr")
